types.name: Vanilla Bean Frappe
types.description: A blend of 3 scoops of vanilla bean powder, steamed milk, ice, and creme frappe syrup. Topped with whipped cream and vanilla syrup.

types.name: Caramel Crunch Frappe
types.description: A blend of caramel syrup added to milk and blended with ice, layered with dark caramel sauce. Topped with whipped cream and caramel-sugar topping.

types.name: Pumpkin Spice Frappe
types.description: A blend of pumpkin with cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, cloves, and allspice, sweet and creamy steamed milk, and ice. Topped with whipped cream and pumpkin- spice powder.

types.name: Pistachio Frappe
types.description: A blend of sweet pistachio sauce, steamed milk, ice, and creme frappe syrup. Topped with whipped cream and pistachio nuts.

types.name: White Chocolate Frappe
types.description: A blend of white chocolate mocha sauce, steamed milk, ice, and creme frappe syrup. Topped with whipped cream and shaved white chocolate.

types.description: A blend of strawberry puree, steamed milk, ice, and creme frappe syrup. Topped with whipped cream and bits of strawberry.

types.description: Caramel syrup with coffee, chocolate, milk, and whipped cream.

types.description: Syrup, cold milk and ice, with a swirl of whipped cream.
